message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm interested, but $120 is a bit more than I was hoping to spend.  Would you be willing to do $100?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
